name: Duck Game (itch) (bxndito)
description:
Fastest Speed Run Time: 1:15 Welcome to Duck Game!

Help the duck find keys and unlock doors to find his love!

How to play

Use WASD to move and space to jump. You can also use the arrows to move.

Found a bug or have a suggestion?

Make sure to make a comment explaining the issue or suggestion so I can see.
